safire.data.loader module¶

class safire.data.loader.DataLoader[source]¶

Bases: object

Class that provides static utility methods for loading deeplearning.net tutorial data.

static as_shared(data, borrow=True)[source]¶

Loads the given data = [features, response] into shared variables and returns a tuplet (shared_features, shared_response) to mimic the original data structure.

Use this function when you wish to convert to shared a feature-response subset of a supervised dataset.

Parameters:
  • data (tuple) – A tuple (features, response) of anything that can successfully undergo numpy.asarray.
  • borrow (bool) – Set to True if the theano.shared call should use borrow=True (default), otherwise set to False. See Theano shared variable documentation for what borrow means.
Returns:

Tuple (shared_features, shared_response) where member are Theano shared variables. The function assumes that the response is discrete and casts it to 'int32' using theano.tensor.cast().
static as_shared_list(data, borrow=True)[source]¶

Loads the given data = [var1, var2...] into shared variables and returns a list [shared_var1, shared_var2...] to mimic the original data structure.

Parameters:
  • data (iterable) – An iterable [var1, var2...] of anything that can successfully undergo numpy.asarray.
  • borrow (bool) – Set to True if the theano.shared call should use borrow=True (default), otherwise set to False. See Theano shared variable documentation for what borrow means.
Returns:

List where all members are Theano shared variables constructed from the original iterable.
